content.description:
The Jagged Edge 5.10a ** (100') F/M(10b)

Climbs the right edge of the far right end of the West Face. Begin on the lower arete and climb the edge of the face, staying on the face as much as possible avoiding the ramps with the poison ivy. 2 chain anchors are over the top.
content.protection: Fixed - 10 bolts, plus several pieces of small to medium gear are possible at the bottom, middle and top, although not necessary.
content.location: Approach via the lower boulder field and looser upper scree slope. Before the slot gully at the top (access to the top) start on the arete at the right edge of the middle level face.

content.description:
About Face 5.11a *** (100') TR (12b)

(Project) - Climbs the face at mid level on the far right side of "The Right Side". Begin just left of 'The Jagged Edge', at the base of the slot chimney, and zigzag your way up the vertical face on small positive edges (avoiding stemming off the other side of the chimney). Cruxes on the lower, middle and upper sections with good rests between - sustained and excellent throughout. Shares the 2 chain anchors over the top with 'The Jagged Edge'.
content.location: Climbs the face at mid level on the far right side of "The Right Side". Begin at the base of the slot chimney about 25' left of the start to The Jagged Edge"
